oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: American Ace Show - 1955-08-06
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program American Ace Show, held at the Ryman on August 6, 1955 between Opry segments. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Carl Smith (host/performer) with the Tunesmiths, and guest performers Autry Inman, and the Louvin Brothers.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carl Smith; Autry Inman; Louvin Brothers; Dale Potter; Tunesmiths
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: American Ace commercial (Minnie Pearl, Grant Turner) -- Opening theme -- Grant Turner introduces Carl Smith -- I Just Dropped In To Say Goodbye (Carl Smith) -- American Ace commercial (Grant Turner) -- Carl Smith introduces Autry Inman -- I Wanna Make Love (& Play, Play House With You) (Autry Inman) -- Carl Smith introduces the Louvin Brothers -- When I Stop Dreaming (Louvin Brothers) -- American Ace commercial (Grant Turner) -- Carl Smith introduces Dale Potter -- Mississippi Sawyer (Dale Potter fiddle, Tunesmiths) -- Closing statement (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Grant Turner, Minnie Pearl) -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); American ace show (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Inman, Autry; Louvin Brothers; Minnie Pearl; Tunesmiths (Musical group); Potter, Dale
